articles.title: 4 shot on Sixth Street early Sunday during SXSW; no critical injuries, police say - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: The shooting happened around 2 a.m. at Sixth and Trinity streets. As police swarmed the scene, authorities issued an alert on social media.
articles.content:
Four people were shot and injured on Sixth Street in downtown Austin early Sunday as the first in-person South by Southwest in two years drew to a close.

articles.title: The Batman Wins the Domestic Weekend Box Office Again and Crosses $300 Million in North America - IGN - IGN
articles.description: Not only has The Batman won the domestic weekend box office for the third week in a row, but it has also become only the second film in the pandemic era to cross $300 million in North America.

articles.title: Anglo American to build huge renewable energy plants - TechCentral
articles.description: Anglo American’s plans to target carbon neutrality at its mining operations will bolster South Africa’s renewable electricity output and provide a major boost to private generation.
articles.content:
An Anglo American platinum mine in Limpopo, South Africa. Image: Anglo American
